metadata.title: CVE-2020-35850 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - low
metadata.description: ** DISPUTED ** An SSRF issue was discovered in cockpit-project.org Cockpit234. NOTE: this is unrelated to the Agentejo Cockpit product. NOTE: thevendor states "I don't think [it] is a big real-life issue."

criterions.comment: cockpit package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
